types.html:
manger maigre

  1. to abstain from meat on certain days appointed by the Roman Catholic Church
    Synonym: faire maigre
trans: to abstain from meat on certain days appointed by the Roman Catholic Church
to abstain from meat on certain days appointed by the Roman Catholic Church
